title: GOALS – Xbox Insider Playtest is Available Today!
description: The post GOALS – Xbox Insider Playtest is Available Today! appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: twoodcock
excerpt: Ready for a fast-paced PvP football showdown? The JOGO Festival kicks off today in GOALS! Jump into fast-paced PvP football action in the Xbox Insider Playtest, available now on Xbox Series X|S. Take on the competition, complete challenges and earn unique rewards in the JOGO Festival – a tribute to the beautiful game.

html:
Ready for a fast-paced PvP football showdown? The JOGO Festival kicks off today in GOALS! Jump into fast-paced PvP football action in the Xbox Insider Playtest, available now on Xbox Series X|S. Take on the competition, complete challenges and earn unique rewards in the JOGO Festival – a tribute to the beautiful game.

About the Game:

GOALS is a gameplay-first, free-to-play, multiplayer focused and esports ready football game, currently in development. Expect a responsive gameplay experience, designed to feel like football. Develop your club, build your squad and prove yourself on the field.

If you want to learn more, please visit the GOALS Official Website!

Want to share your thoughts or just hang out, join the GOALS Official Discord!

How to Participate:

  1. Sign-in on your Xbox Series X|S console and launch the Xbox Insider Hub app (or install the Xbox Insider Hub from the Store first if necessary)
  2. Navigate to Previews > GOALS
  3. Select Join
  4. Wait for the registration to complete and be directed to the Store and install GOALS Alpha

NOTE: Limited space is available and offered first-come first-served.

NOTE: This playtest is only available on Xbox Series X|S consoles.

How to Provide Feedback:

If you experience any issues while playing GOALS, don’t forget to use “Report a problem” so we can investigate:

  • Hold down the home button on your Xbox controller.
  • Select Report a problem.
  • Select the Games category and GOALS Alpha subcategory.
  • Fill out the form with the appropriate details to help our investigation.

Other resources:

  • Get the Xbox Insider Hub app
  • Xbox Insider FAQ
  • How to provide feedback as an Xbox Insider

For more information: follow us on X/Twitter at @XboxInsider and this blog for announcements and more. And feel free to interact with the community on the Xbox Insider SubReddit.
